title: Boy Scouts Phone Call That Never Happened
summary: Trump claimed 'head of the Boy Scouts' called to say Trump's speech was 'the greatest speech that was ever made to them.' Boy Scouts confirmed no such call was made. Pattern of fabricating praise and validation.
keyFacts: Claimed 'head of the Boy Scouts' called to say Trump's speech was 'the greatest speech that was ever made to them'
Boy Scouts confirmed no such call was made
Part of pattern of fabricating praise and validation
Speech itself was controversial for being politically inappropriate for Boy Scouts event

sources.text: Washington Post: Trump says the Boy Scouts called to tell him his speech was the 'greatest.' He appears to have imagined this.
TIME: Boy Scouts 'Unaware' of Call Trump Said He Received From Organization Praising Jamboree Speech
ABC News: Trump citing phone calls with Boy Scouts and Mexico they say never happened
